            ",",

    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[oOsS].*" }
        NoExpression { "[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }

            ",",

            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }

            "#,#0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "33" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",

                    "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }

                format{
                    abbreviated{
